channel.title: Explicity || The Ultimate Gaming Experience ||
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1zg52lt.png[/img]
Hello, And welcome to the development of Explicity. I am using cautionx v2 as a base so it has 602 anims,gfx etc for this and I have found alot of bugs that I decided to fix and I want to rewrite the skills. But I am going to need help so please check the development team thread. I started this as my old development SplitRush when down the trash no one decided to help or even support so I decided to quit it, I am back now with even more knowledge of RSPS as I learnt alot and want to learn even more from this.
The red color code means I have not started the feature yet. The orange color code I have started the features The green color code means I have finished the feature.
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Combat[/b][/size]
- Fix the issue with the buttons doing wrong attacking. E.G. Kick does block - All weapons, bows and staff's require statistics and for some even 2 or 3 - All armour require statistics and for some even 2 or 3
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043125/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Magic[/b][/size]
- All Spells Working - Autocast Working - Alching gives amount of cash or similar to runescape. - All Staff's Working
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043145/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Ranged[/b][/size]
- All Bows Working - All Arrows Working - Bow's Use The Right Arrows, E.G. You can't use rune arrows on a shortbow.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Prayer[/b][/size]
- All Bones Useable With A Good Amount Of EXP - Bones On Altar Work
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044857/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Mining[/b][/size]
- Rocks emptying and refilling - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe and all pickaxes useable - Proper Animations - Prospecting
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044858/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Smithing[/b][/size]
All bars can be made All bars can be smithed All equipment can be produced Correct animations, interfaces and objects used Able to smelt amulets and ring with the use of moulds
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Fishing[/b][/size]
All fish can be caught Correct item requirements Correct animations
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043728/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Cooking[/b][/size]
All fish can be cooked All meats can be cooked Grinding wheat into flour All type of foods can be cooked like pies, stews and cakes. Correct burning formula Cooking gauntlets Correct animation and timing used
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Woodcutting[/b][/size]
Correct hatchet's requirements and can only cut trees with the hatchets if you have the Woodcutting Level. All trees cuttable Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct woodcutting animations
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Firemaking[/b][/size]
All logs lightable Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped Firemaking
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101104013322/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img] [b][size=10pt]Agility[/size][/b]
A Big Agility Place With Alot Of Obstacles Add Alot Of Obstacles Correct Animations Used
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101017212730/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Herblore[/size]
Correct animations Grimy Herbs for cleaning Herb Identifying All potions can be made Correct first and secondary ingredients Weapon Poisoning Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img][size=10pt][b]Thieving[/size]
- NPC And Stall Thieiving - Correct animations
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053743/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Crafting[/b][/size]
- Cutting All Gems - Cutting Leather Armour - NPC To Make Hides Usable To Crafting E.G. Cowhides into leather or hard leather - Spinner to make bow strings ETC.
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053740/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Runecrafting[/b][/size]
- All altars working - Correct multiple crafting - Tiaras work
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Fletching[/b][/size]
- [color=red]All logs can be fletched - Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log) - Can string bows and crossbows - Can make all arrows and bolts
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103032422/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Slayer[/b][/size]
Most slayer masters Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks Slayer gem working Most equipment working Correct requirements for slayer monsters
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img] [size=10pt][b]Farming[/b][/size]
- All seeds can be planted - Correct level requirements - Correct timing for compost and super compost to rot - All herbs can be collected and used for potions - Lots of patches in one place for easier planting - Tool Leprechaun
[size=24pt][b]Extras:[/b][/size]
- Add Dicing - Add Dicing Rights - Finish Donor And Staff Zone - Add Premium Points With Shop - Better Clan Chat, So The Clan Chat Doesn't End When CC Owner Logs Out
Please Support And If You Want Help, I am going to need alot of help as I have school, playstation, revision and this so it will take so long just on my own.
Making development team thread soon.

item.title: Explicity || The Ultimate Gaming Experience ||
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Hello, And welcome to the development of Explicity. I am using cautionx v2 as a base so it has 602 anims,gfx etc for this and I have found alot of bugs that I decided to fix and I want to rewrite the skills. But I am going to need help so please check the development team thread. I started this as my old development SplitRush when down the trash no one decided to help or even support so I decided to quit it, I am back now with even more knowledge of RSPS as I learnt alot and want to learn even more from this.

The red color code means I have not started the feature yet.
The orange color code I have started the features
The green color code means I have finished the feature.

[size=10pt]Combat[/size]

  • Fix the issue with the buttons doing wrong attacking. E.G. Kick does block
  • All weapons, bows and staff’s require statistics and for some even 2 or 3
  • All armour require statistics and for some even 2 or 3

[size=10pt]Magic[/size]

  • All Spells Working
  • Autocast Working
  • Alching gives amount of cash or similar to runescape.
  • All Staff’s Working

[size=10pt]Ranged[/size]

  • All Bows Working
  • All Arrows Working
  • Bow’s Use The Right Arrows, E.G. You can’t use rune arrows on a shortbow.

[size=10pt]Prayer[/size]

  • All Bones Useable With A Good Amount Of EXP
  • Bones On Altar Work

[size=10pt]Mining[/size]

  • Rocks emptying and refilling
  • All ores can be mined
  • Correct pickaxe and all pickaxes useable
  • Proper Animations
  • Prospecting

[size=10pt]Smithing[/size]

All bars can be made
All bars can be smithed
All equipment can be produced
Correct animations, interfaces and objects used
Able to smelt amulets and ring with the use of moulds

[size=10pt]Fishing[/size]

All fish can be caught
Correct item requirements
Correct animations

[size=10pt]Cooking[/size]

All fish can be cooked
All meats can be cooked
Grinding wheat into flour
All type of foods can be cooked like pies, stews and cakes.
Correct burning formula
Cooking gauntlets
Correct animation and timing used

[size=10pt]Woodcutting[/size]

Correct hatchet’s requirements and can only cut trees with the hatchets if you have the Woodcutting Level.
All trees cuttable
Stumps and regrowing trees
Correct hatchet finding
Correct woodcutting animations

[size=10pt]Firemaking[/size]

All logs lightable
Ashes appear after logs burn out
Correct animations
Clipped Firemaking

[size=10pt]Agility[/size]

A Big Agility Place With Alot Of Obstacles
Add Alot Of Obstacles
Correct Animations Used

[size=10pt][b]Herblore[/size]

Correct animations
Grimy Herbs for cleaning
Herb Identifying
All potions can be made
Correct first and secondary ingredients
Weapon Poisoning
Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)

[size=10pt][b]Thieving[/size]

  • NPC And Stall Thieiving
  • Correct animations

[size=10pt]Crafting[/size]

  • Cutting All Gems
  • Cutting Leather Armour
  • NPC To Make Hides Usable To Crafting E.G. Cowhides into leather or hard leather
  • Spinner to make bow strings ETC.

[size=10pt]Runecrafting[/size]

  • All altars working
  • Correct multiple crafting
  • Tiaras work

[size=10pt]Fletching[/size]

  • [color=red]All logs can be fletched
  • Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)
  • Can string bows and crossbows
  • Can make all arrows and bolts

[size=10pt]Slayer[/size]

Most slayer masters
Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks
Slayer gem working
Most equipment working
Correct requirements for slayer monsters

[size=10pt]Farming[/size]

  • All seeds can be planted
  • Correct level requirements
  • Correct timing for compost and super compost to rot
  • All herbs can be collected and used for potions
  • Lots of patches in one place for easier planting
  • Tool Leprechaun

[size=24pt]Extras:[/size]

  • Add Dicing
  • Add Dicing Rights
  • Finish Donor And Staff Zone
  • Add Premium Points With Shop
  • Better Clan Chat, So The Clan Chat Doesn’t End When CC Owner Logs Out

Please Support And If You Want Help, I am going to need alot of help as I have school, playstation, revision and this so it will take so long just on my own.

Making development team thread soon.

Read full topic
